attributes.action: Get Mark Lawenson off tax payers tv hes a disgrace
attributes.additional_details: Following the Euro 2012 its obvious that Mark Lawenson is a disgrace. He is suposed to be an ambassador foe England and all he could do was critisise. He does this all the time with every England game. We as tax payers paid for him to go to the tournament where he was a disgrace and we should choose who we want to send to represent us

rejection.details: This is a matter for the BBC.
